de.uka.ipd.sdq.beagle.core.pcmconnection

Class EmfHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uka.ipd.sdq.beagle.core.pcmconnection.EmfHelper

  • public final class EmfHelper
extends Object
    Helper class provided by the SDQ for working with PCM repository files. Also see EcoreUtil for more helper functions like EcoreUtil.equals(EObject, EObject) to test for equality.

    • Method Detail

      • checkIdentity

        public static boolean checkIdentity(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject identifier1,
                                    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject identifier2)
        Checks for two PCM model elements whether they are the same, i.e. whether they have the same ID. The model elements have to be derived from Identifier. Note that two systems might use the same assembly contexts and components, but still are two different systems. If one of the Identifiers in null, false is returned.
        Parameters:
        identifier1 - One Identifier
        identifier2 - Another Identifier
        Returns:
        true if i1.getId().equals(i2.getId()), false otherwise

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(Collection<? extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> coll,
                               org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject identity)
        Implements an identifier-based contains. Calls checkIdentity(EObject, EObject) to compare the Identifier i with the contents of the collection.
        Parameters:
        coll - A collection of objects.
        identity - An identity to search for.
        Returns:
        true if there is an Identifier in coll with an id equal to i.getID().

      • retainAll

        public static boolean retainAll(Collection<? extends de.uka.ipd.sdq.identifier.Identifier> collection,
                                Collection<? extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> itemsToRetain)
        Collection.retainAll(Collection) for Identifiers based on checkIdentity(EObject, EObject). This method will leave all identifiers in collection that describe an object is itemsToRetain.
        Parameters:
        collection - A collection of identifiers.
        itemsToRetain - The items whose identifiers should be left in collection.
        Returns:
        true only if an element was removed from collection.

      • saveToXMIFile

        public static void saveToXMIFile(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject modelToSave,
                                 String fileName)
                          throws IOException
        Save the given EObject to the file given by filename.
        Parameters:
        modelToSave - The EObject to save
        fileName - The filename where to save.
        Throws:
        IOException - If accessing the file fails.

      • loadFromXMIFile

        public static org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject loadFromXMIFile(String fileName,
                                                            org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage ePackage)
        Loads the root object from an EMF File.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file to load from.
        ePackage - The package to load for.
        Returns:
        The root element read.

        Loads the root object from an EMF File.
        Parameters:

        ePackage - The package to load for.
        Returns:
        The root element read.
